about_the_game:
Good friends. Good cookin’. Good business.

Well, you’ve done it now. You’ve bought that old café and are living the dream of being a snack-slingin’, latté-lobbin’ chef in Softshell Shoals. It’s time to build up your menu, manage your inventory, and serve good food up hot. Meet interesting customers and earn their loyalty to become the trendiest café in this adorable, animal-filled town.

The Daily Specials



Purchase new recipes or have a blast discovering them on your own using the simple cooking grid. What happens if you steep a chicken strip in hot milk? Are you brave enough to find out? Keep an eye on your ingredients, stock up, and manage your menu as your inventory changes. Fine-tune your prices to control demand and conserve resources.

Order Up!



The critters of Softshell Shoals have places to be and things to do! Serve food up fast and fulfill their whole order to earn stars and tips. Spend your stars on power-ups to make food faster and manage your menu with ease.

I’ll Take My Usual



Never underestimate what comfort food can do. Most folk will order off the menu, but your regulars have their own desires. Fulfill their cravings to explore their stories and earn special bonuses.

Early Access Features:

  • Over 200+ recipes to discover
  • 10 unique NPC storylines to explore
  • Ace orders to earn tips and stars
  • Simple and fun inventory management
  • Set your own menu with your own prices

Planned for 1.0:

  • Twitch Crowd Control! Unleash chaos on your café by asking your viewers to run the place for you!
  • Seasons! Unlock different NPCs as the seasons change!
  • Even more unique NPC storylines!
  • Café customization! Beautify your storefront!
